name: PigsCanFly
description: PigsCanFly is a Meme with a dream. We are trying to build a helpful, useful and fun DeFi ecosystem. We aim to generate revenue from multiple avenues; Ads from Free 2 Play games Referral fee’s from Exchange affiliate programs And lot’s more! 69% of all fee's earned from products/games produced by Pigs Can Fly will be redistributed to stakers. Being a memecoin doesn’t mean we won’t have utilities. Our developers will develop some fun and useful tools for its community members as we continue to BUIDL! Our main goal is to make sure everyone has access to our utilities, so we build it with scalability in mind.
